alarm.discovery: Tick Tock... Tick Tock... Tick Tock...
Alert!! Alert!! It's the enemy!! Enemy!!
alarm.attack: It is now your time to die!!
alarm.hp50: Tick Tock... It's not quite time yet!... Tick Tock...
alarm.hp25: Tick... No! Not yet!! No!!... Tock
alarm.dead: Tick Tock, the Alarm is dead...

alice.attack: I thought it was my master but to think it was you...
What is this!?! You're not my master!!!
You're not my master and you pretend to be! How rude!!
Why are you lying to me? Do you want to be my master that badly?
alice.hp50: I can't die yet! Not until I see my master...
alice.hp25: Ma... Master... Please come back... I can't stand this any longer...
alice.kill: Be proud of me, Master. I have killed the imposter.
alice.dead: Finish me... You're not coming back, are you master...
It's too late... I can't see my master anymore...
It's too late... Even if my master could save me...

alligator.discovery: I'm imagining how well you'd fit beneath my skin...
alligator.attack: Mmmm, time to give you a taste!
alligator.hp50: Grrrr... I'm not gonna die just yet!
alligator.hp25: You just want me for my shirt!
alligator.kill: My, my... It's time for a feast.

angeling.discovery: My name is Angeling! You have killed my pals! Prepare to die!
angeling.attack: Don't even think about running away!!
angeling.hp25: To think you want to try and destroy me...
angeling.kill: You foolish creature... Know your place, you lower animals!!

anolian.attack: Let me taste you, just a little bit!
anolian.hp50: Grrrr... You will not skin me alive!
anolian.hp25: You just want me for my skin!...
anolian.kill: Haha! Now to give you a taste!!
anolian.dead: Ugh... Hope you're happy with my skin for your damn headgear!!

archer_skeleton.discovery: All living things around me... It is time for you death!
The smell of life... time to get rid of it!
archer_skeleton.attack: Die, you being full of life!!
archer_skeleton.hp50: Are you trying to rattle my bones?...
archer_skeleton.kill: Wahahaha One Life down... One Less Life...
archer_skeleton.dead: Don't think this is the end of me!!

bathory.discovery: Hehehe! Where are you going? This Granny will love you~!!
bathory.attack: Take this! One serving of Granny's Loving~!!!
bathory.kill: Was my lovin' too much for you? hehehehe~

bon_gun.discovery: You know that you're going to die, why did you bother coming here?
bon_gun.attack: I shall kill you without suffering.
bon_gun.hp50: I did not know you'd fight this well...
Is it wrong to think that I will defeat you?
bon_gun.hp25: I can still fight in this condition!!
Hmmm, you are doing well in this fight.
bon_gun.kill: Don't come here again. You aren't welcome.
Don't bother trying to fight me again... I will always win!
bon_gun.dead: To think I lost to you...

deviruchi.attack: If I stab you, will you die?
deviruchi.hp50: Ack, a Human is attacking me!!
deviruchi.hp25: You silly human, trying to kill me...
deviruchi.kill: Hey! You died... this isn't fun! Get up!
You died~ you're dead... The human is dead~ ehehehehe
deviruchi.dead: Oh my god... a human killed me...
You... You're going to regret this...

evil_druid.discovery: Who is this human that has come into the darkness to find me?!
Welcome! This is your place to die!
evil_druid.attack: Die human, and go back into darkness!!
Death is so nice... and so dark... I shall show you!!
evil_druid.hp50: You seem to be fairing well, human! But not for long!
evil_druid.hp25: I shall not let it end like this!!
evil_druid.dead: Do you think you can get rid of me so easily?!

executioner.discovery: You have come just in time...
executioner.attack: Do you actually think you can defeat me!?
executioner.hp50: Not yet! It's not time for me to part without spilling your blood!
executioner.hp25: Blasphemy! I can still finish you!!
executioner.kill: I think next time, I'll let you live a little bit longer.

ghostring.discovery: Where are you~ Where are you~? Hmmm...
Are you there? Is that where you are? Okay~ I'll be right there...
ghostring.attack: Accept me!!! Why are you doing this to me...
You don't like me? You don't like me anymore?
ghostring.hp50: Why~ Why are you trying to kill me? Do you hate me...?
ghostring.kill: Your body is cold... Now we can be together...
Now we can be together... Hehehehe.
ghostring.dead: You... you don't like me anymore...

goblin_2.attack: Let's Beat him up! Let's Beat him up!!!

goblin_archer.hp50: Oh ho~ You think you can beat me!

golem.kill: It got quiet... It's not talking... It's not moving...
golem.dead: Golem... is turning back into to stone...

greatest_general.attack: I shall give you a gift of... Splinters!!
greatest_general.hp50: Don't hit me in the trunk!!

high_orc.discovery: Heh! How did a human come in here?!
high_orc.hp25: I can endure this~ Just for a little bit longer...

injustice.discovery: Breaking your neck isn't too hard...
injustice.attack: I shall let you meet your ancestors!
injustice.dead: How would I die to someone like you...

isis.discovery: Hey~ What are you doing there?
isis.hp50: Why are you trying to get in the way?...
isis.hp25: Will you please be quiet now?...
isis.kill: Please be quiet for Osiris... He needs quiet...

joker.discovery: There you are... I've been looking for you...

khalitzburg.discovery: Living... human... alive... Time to Kill...
khalitzburg.hp25: I won't die... I won't die... I won't die...
khalitzburg.kill: You're an undead~ You're an undead~ Whee~...

knight_of_abyss.discovery: You puny humans have come to fight me?
knight_of_abyss.attack: Come and taste my steel blade!!
knight_of_abyss.hp50: Your attack is strong... but not strong enough!
knight_of_abyss.hp25: I shall see you as my rival!!
knight_of_abyss.kill: What... You died! I will no longer see you as my rival!
knight_of_abyss.dead: You have defeated me... You are a worthy opponent!

kobold_archer.discovery: Bark! I found him! This way!!

marduk.discovery: Where did you get the courage to find your way here?...
marduk.attack: Here! Have a taste of my strength!
marduk.hp50: It takes more effort than that to kill me!
marduk.hp25: If you run away now, maybe you'll have a chance of living!
marduk.kill: Looks like someone needs to be more cautious!
marduk.dead: To think that I lost to someone like you...

marionette.attack: If you catch on fire, it'll be more fun~
marionette.hp25: I guess I need to burn you some more to quiet you.
marionette.kill: Was that too hot? But it was still fun~ wasn't it?
marionette.dead: Thank you for the sweet release...

merman.attack: You have some guts, trespassing our kingdom, human...
merman.kill: What's this? You came all the way here just to die?...
merman.dead: I'm returning to the ocean life...

metaller.attack: Attacking back? You want a fight? Wanna be smacked down by instruments?
metaller.hp25: Is this fun? Is this fun? Is this fun?

minorous.discovery: It's been long since I met another weak opponent...
minorous.attack: I shall flatten you with my hammer!
minorous.hp50: You think you can win against me?
minorous.hp25: Well done! But it's going to be your last match!!

mummy.discovery: Time for you to join me!!
mummy.hp50: We are forgotten ones... our names cannot be found anywhere...
mummy.hp25: You... You shall go with me...
mummy.dead: I can now be at ease... Forgive me Osiris...

munak.discovery: I found you~ Wait for me~...
munak.attack: Being by yourself isn't good for you~
munak.hp50: Why are you being like this?...
munak.hp25: I want to be with you~ And to do that, I must die...
munak.kill: Yes... This way we can always be together...
munak.dead: NoOoo~ I don't want things to end this way!

mutant_dragon.discovery: I've been waiting to burn somebody!!!
mutant_dragon.attack: You shall burn now like you would in hell!!
mutant_dragon.hp50: You aren't burning as well as I'd like...
mutant_dragon.dead: I am returning to the firey pits that I came from...

mysteltainn.discovery: Wait for me... I want to show you something!
mysteltainn.attack: I want to teach you the ways to use a sword!
mysteltainn.hp50: You're doing well~ But how's this?!
mysteltainn.kill: Hmm... You were not as good as I thought...
mysteltainn.dead: You have learned the way of attacking very well...

obeaune.discovery: I have found you, my love...
obeaune.hp25: It wasn't like this long time ago...!!
obeaune.kill: This is far from over if you think you can escape from me!
obeaune.dead: You were finally able to defeat me.....

orc_archer.discovery: You can't hide from my arrows!
orc_archer.attack: He who shoots more arrows wins!
orc_archer.kill: Orcs win it all! Humans are too easily defeated!
orc_archer.dead: The Orc throne is defeated by measly humans....

orc_lady.hp50: You're going to hit beautiful me?!
orc_lady.hp25: Please... You need to stop hitting someone as beautiful as me...
orc_lady.kill: Was I just too beautiful for you?
orc_lady.dead: Don't hate me because I'm beautiful!!!

orc_skeleton.attack: Die... All living things must Die...
orc_skeleton.hp50: There will be no more suffering after death...

orc_zombie.discovery: Life... Death... Time to bring death...
orc_zombie.kill: Must find next living being and kill...

orc_warrior.discovery: Who dares to disturb the Orcs?!
orc_warrior.attack: You dare to attack the Orc?!

ork_warrior.discovery: Who dares to disturb the Orcs?!
ork_warrior.attack: You dare to attack the Orc?!

pirate_skel.discovery: Ahoy~ Time to make some money~
pirate_skel.attack: It's an attack!! Kill for all they've got!
pirate_skel.hp50: I will have your head for this!~
pirate_skel.hp25: I want your Zeny! I won't go without your Zeny~~
pirate_skel.dead: Even if we're dead... We will always be here...

raggler.discovery: Detected enemy vessel! Requesting back up!!
raggler.attack: Everyone attack together! Annihilate the enemy!!
raggler.hp50: Check for the bullets! Prepare for their surprise attack!!
raggler.hp25: They are stronger than expected! Reposition yourselves!
raggler.kill: Enemy annihilated! Now back to the base!

raydric.attack: Your mistake will lead you to death. Better be careful, eh?
Plate soaked with blood is so beautiful.
if you accept that you have lost, I'll let you go alive.
raydric.hp50: Not yet! I can't lose so easily!
raydric.hp25: We knights will never fall back!
raydric.kill: The enemy has fallen and I am victorious!!
raydric.dead: Don't think this is the end!!
I fought 'til end to protect my honor.

raydric_archer.discovery: Time to give you a taste of my arrows!
raydric_archer.hp50: The enemy is strong but I am stronger!
raydric_archer.hp25: The enemy is winning! I can't give up!

requiem.discovery: I shall make you a grave here...
requiem.hp50: Things are as easy as it seems!
requiem.dead: So death is supposed to be like this...

skel_prisoner.discovery: It's heavy... and such a burden... living...
skel_prisoner.attack: Give me your body... Give me your body...
skel_prisoner.hp50: If you don't give me your body, I will take it from you...
skel_prisoner.dead: Nooo. All I wanted was a body...

skel_worker.discovery: Jewels, such beautiful minerals!! Come to me and shine!!
skel_worker.attack: What are you stealing in our mine, you thief?!
skel_worker.hp50: You... the hell!! Get out now!!
skel_worker.hp25: He...help!! They are too strong!! I can't take them alone!!!

soldier_skeleton.discovery: Stop right there, you living thing!
soldier_skeleton.dead: Don't get happy over the fact that you've defeated me!!

steam_goblin.hp50: Toot toot, I can do better!!
steam_goblin.kill: Are you out of steam already?

strouf.discovery: What are you doing under the sea!!
strouf.attack: Do you really think you can beat me!?
strouf.hp25: So you know how to attack!
strouf.kill: Did you ever think that scum like you can beat me?
strouf.dead: You got me this time but you won't get out alive!

tirfing.discovery: I must find my enemy and destroy~
tirfing.attack: I might sever one more head today~
tirfing.hp25: I shall slice you into many pieces~
tirfing.kill: I will make mince meat out of you~
tirfing.dead: There are no reasons for me to be defeated!

tyrfing.discovery: I must find my enemy and destroy~
tyrfing.attack: I might sever one more head today~
tyrfing.hp25: I shall slice you into many pieces~
tyrfing.kill: I will make mince meat out of you~
tyrfing.dead: There are no reasons for me to be defeated!

vocal.discovery: I will sing you a song~!!
vocal.hp25: I am a singer~ Don't take that dream away from me~
vocal.dead: Did you not like my singing?

wander_man.discovery: Your footsteps are heavy, I could hear you coming.
wander_man.attack: NAM-JIN SINGLE SWORD secret attack! FLASH BLADE!!
wander_man.hp50: Your skills are good, but is it enough to defeat me?
wander_man.hp25: You are a good opponent, you are good...
wander_man.kill: Nothing matches better than blood on the tip of blade.
Ahh, I love the smell of blood...

wind_ghost.discovery: I can see the sky so clearly, can you?
wind_ghost.hp25: Did time go by? Did my life go by?
wind_ghost.kill: Your life fell from the sky~ Can you see it?
wind_ghost.dead: I see the light from the skies... Is there where I go?

wraith.discovery: Constricting the life out of you is my specialty...
wraith.attack: Let me just give you a big bite!
wraith.kill: You were tasty~ I want to eat you some more.

zerom.discovery: Why are you cowering over there...
zerom.attack: Time to get rid of you!!
zerom.kill: Starting your life over isn't so bad!

zherlthsh.hp25: Not yet! Give me More~ More!!
zherlthsh.kill: This was just the beginning and you give up already?
zherlthsh.dead: More~~ Next time, give me more~~~

zombie_prisoner.hp25: Save me... I don't want to die...
zombie_prisoner.kill: I guess you wanted to die...
zombie_prisoner.dead: I don't want to be in prison... save me...

am_mut.discovery: I will find the enemy today~ lalala~
am_mut.attack: Will it hurt if I beat you with my club?
am_mut.kill: Aw, did I put a hole in your head?
am_mut.dead: You can't take away my club...

ancient_mummy.attack: I will save the Pharaoh from the likes of you...
ancient_mummy.hp50: Pharaoh! Give me the strength to defeat the enemy!!
ancient_mummy.hp25: Pharaoh! Give me strength to protect you!!
ancient_mummy.kill: I will return the throne to Pharaoh!
ancient_mummy.dead: Pharaoh~ Forgive me for my failure...

assulter.discovery: State your reason for being here!
assulter.hp25: My life is to defeat you!!
assulter.kill: No one can defeat the ninja turtle!

cat_o_nine_tail.attack: Are you trying to make me wear pants?
cat_o_nine_tail.hp25: Can't you just die now, please?
cat_o_nine_tail.kill: How does it feel to kiss the ground?
cat_o_nine_tail.dead: No~ I don't want to wear pants!!

dark_illusion.discovery: Following through the mist, searching for the power...
dark_illusion.attack: I will get rid of you for the Dark Lord!
By the name of the Dark Lord, you shall kneel before me!!
dark_illusion.hp50: My powers are not coming to me...
dark_illusion.kill: Enter the forever darkness into the eternal sleep!
dark_illusion.dead: Back to the depths of hell I go... but I shall return!

g_assulter.discovery: State your reason for being here!
g_assulter.hp25: My life is to defeat you!!
g_assulter.kill: No one can defeat the ninja turtle!

goblin_leader.discovery: Who has come to taunt me?
goblin_leader.attack: Fight me with all you've got!!
goblin_leader.dead: I let you win this time... Next time I won't be so easy on you...

kobold_leader.discovery: As the Kobold Leader, I greet you...
kobold_leader.attack: Even if you run away, I can sniff you out~
kobold_leader.hp50: Who do you think I look like?
kobold_leader.kill: WooOoOOoo! We got rid of the human!

majoruros.attack: You will die to my hammer...
majoruros.hp50: Ha! My hammer is greater than you...
majoruros.hp25: This isn't the end... You will die soon...
majoruros.kill: You flatten too easily to my hammer...

maya_puple.attack: You're the one that kidnapped my mother, isn't it?!
maya_puple.hp25: Why did you kidnap her? Was it for the money?
maya_puple.kill: If you die, you can't answer me...
maya_puple.dead: Now I can't find my mother...

mobster.attack: Give it to me when I ask nicely!!
mobster.hp25: That's it, you want to fight me like that?
mobster.kill: You can't beat someone like me...
mobster.dead: That wasn't even a fair fight!

owl_baron.discovery: What business do you have with me~
owl_baron.attack: Even without you, I still have business~
owl_baron.kill: I think you need to offer a better proposition.
owl_baron.dead: This wasn't part of the deal...

owl_duke.discovery: Who are you and why are you here?
owl_duke.attack: Have you come to entertain me?!
owl_duke.hp50: I know you can give me more show than this...
owl_duke.hp25: Is this all the effort you're going to put in?...
owl_duke.kill: What do you think about this act?

panzer_goblin.discovery: Do you know the truth about me?~
panzer_goblin.hp50: My jet stream is stronger than you think!~
panzer_goblin.kill: AH HA! I told you my jet stream always wins!~

skeleton_general.discovery: I found you! Now is time for you to die!
skeleton_general.hp25: You can't break my bones so easily!

wraith_dead.discovery: I'll open my mouth and give you a bite!
wraith_dead.attack: I can gobble you up in one bite?
wraith_dead.hp50: It's good to be digested inside me.
wraith_dead.kill: You and I are now the same...
wraith_dead.dead: I will make sure to kill you next time~

zombie_master.discovery: Today I will find the enemy and...
zombie_master.attack: It's dark... I feel my body getting better...
zombie_master.hp50: My body smells of rotting... the way it should be...
zombie_master.hp25: The idea of my rotting body is so nice...
zombie_master.kill: Your body will rot along with mine now... hehehe...
zombie_master.dead: Living isn't any better than dieing anyway...

baphomet.attack: I'll cut you half with my crescent scythe!
baphomet.hp50: Baaaah!! Give up on your pathetic attacks already!
baphomet.hp25: You took so long and you couldn't kill me! Now, is my turn!
baphomet.dead: You think you're special now, don't you?

dark_lord.attack: Mwahaha! Is that all you can do?
Allow me to personally take you to Niflheim!
dark_lord.hp50: HAHAHA! Do you think you can kill something that is already dead?!
My undead minions will devour your flesh!
dark_lord.hp25: I shall lead you to forever darkness
My dark powers will tear you limb from limb!
dark_lord.kill: Your soul goes into the darkness
Ahh...another minion to join my army!
dark_lord.dead: Argh! You haven't seen the last of me...
You may have beaten me... But I shall return, stronger than before!

doppelganger.hp50: Yes! That was a great timing to attack!
doppelganger.hp25: Excellent move! But still not good enough!
doppelganger.kill: Just as I thought...you won't do. Better wait for the other.
doppelganger.dead: You... You were an excellent opponent... Now I can go with honor...

drake.discovery: Yo Ho Yo Ho, an undead Pirate's Life for Meeee~~
drake.attack: Ye want to taste the metal of me hook, do ye?! Arrrr!
drake.hp50: Arr, I think me needs some more rum.!
drake.hp25: Arg!! Ye be workin me down the me bones, says I.
drake.kill: Welcome to my world, me matey...
drake.dead: Arr, perhaps I shall find peace in Davy Jones's locker.

eddga.discovery: Have you come to take my pipe?
eddga.attack: I will never give up my pipe to the likes of you!
eddga.hp50: You're tough, but how much longer can you last?
eddga.hp25: You're lasting longer then I thought, got much more in you?
eddga.kill: I figured you didn't have it in you..
eddga.dead: No... I mustn't lose... my pipe, don't take my pipe...

knight_of_windstorm.hp50: You like to play rough? Alright, let's play rough!
knight_of_windstorm.hp25: I'm beginning to think you don't like playing with me...
knight_of_windstorm.kill: Aww, don't want to play anymore?

bloody_knight.hp50: I need more blood, give it to me!
bloody_knight.hp25: I am feeling weak... need blood...

maya.discovery: So you're the one who's been killing my children!
maya.attack: You will be punished for hurting my brood!
maya.hp50: I will punish you for your crimes!
maya.hp25: Why do you seek to kill us?
maya.kill: We will feast upon your corpse later.
maya.dead: My children, I have failed you...

mistress.attack: The enemy is here to dethrone the queen bee!
mistress.dead: How dare you defeat someone like me!!

moonlight.discovery: By the power of Moonlight, I will punish you!
Dashing in the dark, running around is exciting!
moonlight.attack: Moonlight Bell Power!!! Die! Die! Die!
moonlight.kill: Even with no pants, I can still whoop you!!

orc_lord.attack: I shall show you my true strength!!
orc_lord.hp25: I feel my blood is about to spill!!
orc_lord.dead: You may have won this time... But it's not the end!!

ork_hero.discovery: It's a human! My Orcs! Come and attack!!
ork_hero.attack: I promise to show you the truth strength of the Orcs!
ork_hero.hp50: I will no longer be oppressed by the humans!
ork_hero.hp25: Don't give up until the very end!
ork_hero.kill: This is the end... The end for you, humans...

osiris.discovery: Who is the one that disturbs my sleep!
osiris.attack: You are in deep trouble for disturbing my sleep!
osiris.hp50: No matter how long you try to avoid me, it won't be for long!
osiris.dead: Now I can sleep without being disturbed...

phreeoni.discovery: I shall lick you to death!!
phreeoni.attack: Fear the wrath of my tongue!!
phreeoni.kill: This was so fun~ You taste good~
phreeoni.dead: You taste so strong... I don't like this... that flavor...

turtle_general.discovery: What are you doing in the Turtle's Sacred Ground!?!
turtle_general.attack: If you murder us just to test your strength I'll kill you for it!
turtle_general.hp50: You are one though shell to crack!
turtle_general.hp25: My shell is tougher than you think!
turtle_general.kill: Don't you wish you had a shell to hide in?!
turtle_general.dead: Do... Do not tell my death to the other turtles!!
